mapper.insert: insert into spring_blog_comments (comment_no, comment_writer, comment_content, blog_no) values (spring_comment_seq.nextval, #{writer}, #{content}, #{blogNo})
mapper.select: select comment_no, comment_writer, comment_content, blog_no, comment_create_date from spring_blog_comments a, spring_users b where blog_no = #{value} and a.comment_writer = b.user_id
